page.title: 11Other Glenalmond activities
page.content:
The Combined Cadet Force, a valuable asset, disciplines the pupils, teaches them new skills and offers a wide range of opportunities, for instance, flying, parachuting and sub-aqua.
{______________________________________ {Careers:}Roughly 7 careers lectures are given a year and holiday career courses are encouraged. Also, funds are available for educational awards. About 90% of the school further their education, 66% in universities. The most popular are: 1st Cambridge, 2nd Edinburgh, 3rd Aberdeen, 4th London and 5th Oxford. The most popular careers are the professions (especially law and accountancy), business, the forces and farming.
